Literature.Title: Isolation and Structural Elucidation of Brevibacillin, an Antimicrobial Lipopeptide from Brevibacillus laterosporus That Combats Drug-Resistant Gram-Positive Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Huang E, Yuan C, Zhang L, Yousef AE

Literature.Title: Brevibacillin 2V, a Novel Antimicrobial Lipopeptide With an Exceptionally Low Hemolytic Activity.
Literature.Author: Zhao X, Wang X, Shukla R, Kumar R, Weingarth M, Breukink E, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Alicyclobacillus acidoterrestris ATCC 49025(MIC=0.5-1.0µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=1µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum ATCC 8014(MIC=1µg/ml),Lactococcus lactis ATCC 11454(MIC=2µg/ml),Listeria innocua ATCC 33090(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes Scot A(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium DT104(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15975(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis LMG 16216(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=32µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(50-60% Cytotoxicity=5.21±0.01µg/ml)
